job_tasks.phrase: align our technology supports our business goals
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions aligning technology with business goals, which is the core of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: prioritize development tasks that align with business goals and deliver real value
job_tasks.justification: This directly indicates an understanding of business objectives and translating them into development priorities for tangible value.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive the automation of key ODOO ERP processes. Develop Python and JavaScript apps for data processing and system integration.
job_tasks.justification: Developing applications for data processing and system integration, especially within an ERP context, falls under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize Google Cloud for data lake and cloud functions, with BigQuery and Dataform for data management.
job_tasks.justification: Managing a data lake, cloud functions, and using tools like BigQuery and Dataform are all data engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: explore integrations with Dify for LLM (Large Language Model) capabilities
job_tasks.justification: Exploring LLM capabilities and integrating them signifies work with generative models.
Identifies the primary role as a software engineer focusing on Python development.
This is a direct statement of core software development activity.
Indicates the creation of applications using specific programming languages.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve code reliability, CI/CD pipelines, ensure robust QA, and manage code reviews
job_tasks.justification: CI/CD pipelines, QA, and code reviews are key components of operations and MLOps.
GitLab/GitHub are tools commonly used for CI/CD and code management, relating to operations.

classification.rationale: The job description mentions exploring LLM capabilities with Dify, but the primary focus is on Python software engineering, ERP development, and general software operations. There is no deep dive into generative modeling techniques or building complex GenAI systems, which are the hallmarks of a GenAI Engineer.
